item.title: CUDA, PyTorch and VSC Installation on Windows 10
item.description: My old laptop(Thinkpad W520) has a GPU, i want to use it to learn some AI technologies, this notes lists the key steps to configure a Nvidia GPU enabled development environment 1. Review latest online guide -> 2. Find out the GPU Model info -> 3. find out the latest GPU driver version -> 4. determine the CUDA Toolkit version -> 5. Review the selected version CUDA toolkit online guide -> 6.
